about_the_game:
This short visual novel is a derivative work of the Touhou Project.

Let the wicked hermit Seiga Kaku share her Taoist wisdom with you. With her help, you will surely achieve your goals in life and become a better person. To the Tao, no problem is insurmountable. Learn about the philosophy of Taoism, and how to apply it to find love, success, and peace of mind. And don't die.

Features

  • Two endings with several variation (for a total of 5 different endings)
  • A complete English translation of Tao Te Ching, one of the fundamental texts of Taoism. With in-character notes and interpretations by Seiga Kaku.
  • Original ZUN-style art by Ryann1908
  • Original meditative music by Bahia

Inspired by the games of Sigyaad Team.
detailed_description:
This short visual novel is a derivative work of the Touhou Project.

Let the wicked hermit Seiga Kaku share her Taoist wisdom with you. With her help, you will surely achieve your goals in life and become a better person. To the Tao, no problem is insurmountable. Learn about the philosophy of Taoism, and how to apply it to find love, success, and peace of mind. And don't die.

Features

  • Two endings with several variation (for a total of 5 different endings)
  • A complete English translation of Tao Te Ching, one of the fundamental texts of Taoism. With in-character notes and interpretations by Seiga Kaku.
  • Original ZUN-style art by Ryann1908
  • Original meditative music by Bahia

Inspired by the games of Sigyaad Team.
legal_notice:
This game is a derivative work of the Touhou Project.
The Touhou Project is the property of Team Shanghai Alice. This game is made in accordance with the official guidelines for Touhou fanworks.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 143 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 143 MB available space

short_description: This short visual novel is a derivative work of the Touhou Project. The wicked hermit Seiga Kaku uses her Taoist arts to help you achieve your goals and become a better person.
